column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////First time here on vacation with my husband
column2: recommended by our hotel concierge and it's the best Chicago pizza ever! I'm back in California and have been dreaming about it since! My husband and I had the bruschetta appetizer and made our own pizza. We about licked our plates
column3: long wait but so worth it
column4: all the flavors in every bite! I wish they were in California
